entities.name: hogwarts
entities.description: Hogwarts is described as a school by Madam Marchbanks.

entities.name: cornelius fudge
entities.description: Cornelius Fudge's office is mentioned as being involved in the discredit of Albus Dumbledore.

entities.name: madam marchbanks
entities.description: Madam Marchbanks is quoted as saying that Hogwarts is not an outpost of Cornelius Fudge's office.

entities.name: albus dumbledore
entities.description: Albus Dumbledore is mentioned as being discredited by Cornelius Fudge.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is quoted as saying that she knows how they ended up with Umbridge.

entities.name: umbridge
entities.description: Umbridge is mentioned as being given the power to inspect other teachers by Cornelius Fudge.

entities.name: mcgonagall
entities.description: McGonagall is mentioned as being someone that Ron wants to see inspected by Umbridge.

relationships.description: Cornelius Fudge gave the power to inspect other teachers to Umbridge.
